category.name: SocialCollaboration.AWC
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: S2cl_SocialTileHeightInLines
preference.preference_description: Defines the number of lines to show while rendering the Social Object Cell used for showing Commentary in grouped view. A value of -1 or 0 displays entire commentary text in Social Object cell. A value greater than zero limits the display of the commentary text to that many lines in Social Object cell. For example: if the value is set to 5 then commentary text is displayed on the Social Object Cell will not exceed 5 lines. If the commentary text is small and fits in less than 5 lines then only appropriate number of lines are displayed in the Social Object Cell.
